targets.expr:
max(
    max(rds_instance_vcpu_average{}) by (instance_class)
    * on (instance_class)
    group_left(dbidentifier)
    max(rds_instance_info{aws_account_id="$aws_account_id",aws_region="$aws_region",dbidentifier="$dbidentifier"}) by (aws_account_id, aws_region, dbidentifier, instance_class)
)

max(
    max(rds_instance_memory_bytes{}) by (instance_class)
    * on (instance_class)
    group_left(aws_account_id,aws_region,dbidentifier)
    max(rds_instance_info{aws_account_id="$aws_account_id",aws_region="$aws_region",dbidentifier="$dbidentifier"}) by (aws_account_id, aws_region, dbidentifier, instance_class)
)

panels.description: Number of active queries waiting for CPU or not. For optimal performances, should not have more CPU wait that number of CPU

targets.expr:
max(
    max(rds_instance_vcpu_average{}) by (instance_class)
    * on (instance_class)
    group_left(aws_account_id,aws_region,dbidentifier)
    max(rds_instance_info{aws_account_id="$aws_account_id",aws_region="$aws_region",dbidentifier="$dbidentifier"}) by (aws_account_id, aws_region, dbidentifier, instance_class)
)

panels.title: Active queries vs vCPU

panels.description: The amount of available random access memory

targets.expr:
100
- max(rds_freeable_memory_bytes{aws_account_id="$aws_account_id",aws_region="$aws_region",dbidentifier="$dbidentifier"}) by (dbidentifier)
* 100
/ on(dbidentifier) (
    max(rds_instance_memory_bytes{}) by (instance_class)
    * on (instance_class)
    group_right()
    max(rds_instance_info{aws_account_id="$aws_account_id",aws_region="$aws_region",dbidentifier="$dbidentifier"}) by (dbidentifier, instance_class)
)

max(
    max(rds_instance_memory_bytes{}) by (instance_class)
    * on (instance_class)
    group_left(dbidentifier) max(rds_instance_info{aws_account_id="$aws_account_id",aws_region="$aws_region",dbidentifier="$dbidentifier"}) by (dbidentifier, instance_class)
)
